Amazon
Class AmazonProductAPI

class AmazonProductAPI

Class to access Amazons Product Advertising API

Authors:
Sameer Borate, Andreas Itzchak Rehberg
Version:
1.0 by Sameer Borate
1.1 by Andreas Itzchak Rehberg: Added constructor and introduced local_site attribute (rawly following Wern-Ancheta Blog)
See also:
CodeDiesel.COM
CodeDiesel Blog Article on this API
Wern-Ancheta Blog

Change logs
2011-10-19 last changes by CodeDiesel
2014-04-21 reformatted, ApiDoc added (Izzy)
2014-04-22 added constructor (Izzy)

Constructor Detail

AmazonProductAPI()

void AmazonProductAPI(string $public, string $private, string $associate_tag, [string $local_site])

Initialize the class with your credentials

Parameters:
public - Public key to be used
private - Private string to be used
associate_tag - Amazon Partner ID
local_site - Amazon site to query (e.g. 'com','de', â€¦), defaults to 'de'

Method Detail

getItemByAsin()

mixed getItemByAsin(integer $asin_code, [string $response_group])

Return details of a product searched by ASIN

Parameters:
asin_code - ASIN code of the product to search
response_group - Response-Group. Defaults to 'Medium'. For alternatives, see http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSECommerceService/latest/DG/CHAP_ResponseGroupsList.html
Returns:
simpleXML object
Version:
Note that not all response groups are valid for item lookup by ASIN (e.g. list-types are not, most probably), so we restrict them

Change logs
2014-04-22 added parameter to pass the wanted response-group as parameter, added check for valid response-groups (Izzy)

getItemByKeyword()

mixed getItemByKeyword(string $keyword, string $product_type, [string $response_group])

Return details of a product searched by keyword Search is done in titles and descriptions, max 10 results are returned

Parameters:
keyword - keyword to search
product_type - type of the product
response_group - Response-Group. Defaults to 'Small'. For alternatives, see http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSECommerceService/latest/DG/CHAP_ResponseGroupsList.html
Returns:
simpleXML object
Version:
Note that not all response groups are valid, and also the response might get quite large. Hence for now, they are limited to Small and Medium.

Change logs
2014-04-22 added parameter "Availibility": it makes no sense to promote articles which are not available, so we exclude those (Izzy)
2014-04-22 added parameter to pass the wanted response-group; no check here, as that would be a little complex (Izzy)

getItemByUpc()

mixed getItemByUpc(integer $upc_code, string $product_type)

Return details of a product searched by UPC

Parameters:
upc_code - UPC code of the product to search
product_type - type of the product
Returns:
simpleXML object

queryAmazon()

mixed queryAmazon(array $parameters)

Query Amazon with the issued parameters

Parameters:
parameters - parameters to query around
Returns:
simpleXmlObject xml query response

searchProducts()

mixed searchProducts(string $search, string $category, string $searchType)

Return details of products searched by various types

Parameters:
search - search term
category - search category
searchType - type of search
Returns:
simpleXML object

verifyXmlResponse()

mixed verifyXmlResponse(mixed $response)

Check if the xml received from Amazon is valid

Parameters:
response - xml response to check
Returns:
ARRAY(0x211c498)
